crons.comment: Main expiry check on June 1st (Configured in deadline-config.json)
Weekly notification cleanup on Sundays at 4:00 AM IST (22:30 UTC Saturday)
Delete expired students on August 31 every year (hard delete date from deadline-config.json)
Weekly cleanup: expire old swap requests (Sundays at 4:00 AM IST)
Annual payment export on June 30 at 9:00 AM IST (3:30 UTC) - academic year end date from deadline-config.json
Every minute: cleanup stale trip locks and pending intents for multi-driver system
Every minute: expire pending missed-bus requests that exceeded TTL
